text: Adelardo Rodríguez Sánchez, also known as Adelardo (born 26 September 1939), is a Spanish former professional footballer. He made 14 appearances and two goals for the Spain national football team from 1962 until 1970. ==Other websites== * * National team data at BDFutbol * * Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish footballers
title: Adelardo
